notes_display: In Historical Sketches of the Paper Currency of the American Colonies by Henry Phillips, Jr. (1865). Given to Dr. Jesse C. Green in 1890. Leaf 56BB.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: THREE SHILLINGS. THIS Bill shall pass current for THREE SHILLINGS, according to an ACT of GENERAL ASSEMBLY of the Common-Wealth of Pennsylvania, passed the Twentieth Day of March, in the Year One Thousand Seven Hundred and Seventy-seven.  Dated the Tenth Day of April, A.D. 1777. THREE SHILLINGS.
issue_reverse_legend_s: Three Shillings. | To Counterfeit is Death. | PHILADELPHIA: Printed by JOHN DUNLAP. 1777.
